languages.text: "Неужели мои глаза изменяют мне? Объяснись, элантах. Почему в твоих покоях таится осколок Крудараха?"

traits.locale_text: "Неужели мои глаза изменяют мне? Объяснись, эл'антар. Почему в твоих покоях таится осколок Кудараха?"

languages.text: "Do my eyes deceive me? Explain yourself, elantach. Why is there a shard of Crudarach in your chamber?"
languages.original_text: "Неужели мои глаза изменяют мне? Объяснись, элантах. Почему в твоих покоях таится осколок Крудараха?"

traits.locale_text: "Do my eyes deceive me? Explain yourself, elantach. Why is there a shard of Crudarach lurking in your chamber?"
"Do my eyes deceive me? Explain yourself, elantach. Why is there a shard of Crudarach lurking in your chamber?"
"Do my eyes fail me? Explain yourself, elantach. Why is there a shard of Crudarach lurking in your chamber?"
"Do my eyes fail me? Explain yourself, elantach. Why is there a shard of Crudarach lurking in your chamber?"
"Do my eyes deceive me? Explain yourself, elantach. Why is there a shard of Crudarach in your chamber?"
"Do my eyes deceive me? Explain yourself, elantach. Why is there a shard of Crudarach in your chamber?"

languages.text: « Suis-je victime d'une hallucination ? Expliquez-vous, elantach. Pourquoi y a-t-il un fragment de Crudarach dans vos quartiers ? »
languages.original_text: "Do my eyes deceive me? Explain yourself, elantach. Why is there a shard of Crudarach in your chamber?"

traits.locale_text: « Suis-je victime d'une hallucination ? Expliquez-vous, elantach. Pourquoi y a-t-il un fragment de Crudarach dans vos quartiers ? »

languages.text: “莫非是我看错了吗？解释一下吧，外界人？为什么你的房间里会有克鲁达拉赫的碎片？”
languages.original_text: "Do my eyes deceive me? Explain yourself, elantach. Why is there a shard of Crudarach in your chamber?"

traits.locale_text: “莫非是我看错了吗？解释一下吧，外界人？为什么你的房间里会有克鲁达拉赫的碎片？”

languages.text: 「私の目が欺かれているのか？説明してくれ、エランタよ。なぜクルダラの破片があなたの部屋にあるのだ？」
languages.original_text: "Do my eyes deceive me? Explain yourself, elantach. Why is there a shard of Crudarach in your chamber?"

traits.locale_text: 「私の目が欺かれているのか？説明してくれ、エランタよ。なぜクルダラの破片があなたの部屋にあるのだ？」

languages.text: "Trügen meine Augen mich? Erklärt Euch, Elantach. Warum liegt ein Splitter von Crudarach in Eurem Quartier?"
languages.original_text: "Do my eyes deceive me? Explain yourself, elantach. Why is there a shard of Crudarach in your chamber?"

traits.locale_text: "Trügen mich etwa meine Augen? Erklärt Euch, Elantach. Warum liegt ein Splitter von Crudarach in Eurem Quartier?"

languages.text: «¿Me engañan mis ojos? Explícate, elantach. ¿Por qué hay un fragmento de Crudarach en tus estancias?».
languages.original_text: "Do my eyes deceive me? Explain yourself, elantach. Why is there a shard of Crudarach in your chamber?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Me engañan mis ojos? Explícate, elantach. ¿Por qué hay un fragmento de Crudarach en tus estancias?».

languages.text: "Gözlerim yanlış mı görüyor? Kendini izah et elantach. Neden odanda Crudarach'tan bir parça duruyor?"
languages.original_text: "Do my eyes deceive me? Explain yourself, elantach. Why is there a shard of Crudarach in your chamber?"

traits.locale_text: "Gözlerim yanlış mı görüyor? Kendini izah et elantach. Neden odanda Crudarach'tan bir parça duruyor?"
